ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and the creation of male and female,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And Him who created the male and female,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and by Him Who created the male and the female:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and by that (Power) which created the male and female,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And by oath of the One Who created the male and the female.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: By Him Who created male and female.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the creating of the male and the female,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and That which created the male and the female,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And Him Who hath created male and female,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and by the creation of the male and the female.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: By Him Who hath created the male and the female,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: by Him who created the male and the female:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: By (the mystery of) the creation of male and female;-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And by Him Who created male and female;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And by Who created the male and female,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And He who created the male and the female.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [by] He who created the male and female,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [92:3] and [by] the One Who (mā either functions as man, ‘the One Who’, or it is related to a verbal action) created the male and the female, Adam and Eve, or every male and female — the hermaphrodite, although problematic for us, is [in fact] either male or female according to God, and therefore a person [actually] commits perjury if he speaks with one [thinking that] because he has sworn not to speak with a male or a female; [he may do so with a hermaphrodite].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And Him Who hath created) and by Him Who has created the (male and female,
